hobbyPosts.title: Cryptocurrency Meetup Promotion
hobbyPosts.excerpt: I enjoy creating new forms of outreach and education, such as sharing 3D printed Casascius coins for teaching self custody and proper seed management.
hobbyPosts.description: I enjoy creating new forms of outreach and education, such as sharing 3D printed Casascius coins for teaching self custody and proper seed management. This hands-on approach makes complex security concepts tangible and memorable for newcomers to cryptocurrency.
achievements: Created educational 3D printed Casascius coin demonstrations
Taught self custody concepts through tactile learning
Developed innovative outreach methods for crypto education

hobbyPosts.title: BBC Micro:bit Python Projects & Hardware Security Education
hobbyPosts.excerpt: Designed and implemented Python coding projects for BBC Micro:bit controllers, teaching children fundamental programming concepts and hardware security through hands-on interaction.
hobbyPosts.description: Comprehensive educational program combining Python programming instruction with hardware security concepts using BBC Micro:bit controllers. This project teaches children fundamental programming skills while introducing them to IoT security, hardware wallets, and safe computing practices through interactive, hands-on learning experiences.
achievements: Designed and implemented Python coding projects for BBC Micro:bit controllers
Taught 100+ students fundamental programming concepts through microcontroller IoT projects
Created interactive IoT security demonstration projects
Established hands-on learning methodology for young programmers

hobbyPosts.title: AI Video Generation: From Concept to Marketing
hobbyPosts.excerpt: Experimenting with generative AI video tools for marketing applications. See my short AI-generated video example in action.
hobbyPosts.description: I use ComfyUI on advanced hardware to learn advanced AI generation tools
achievements: Generated sample marketing video content using AI
Explored ComfyUI for advanced video generation
Analyzed practical applications for client work
Created workflow for rapid video prototyping

hobbyPosts.title: Behind the Scenes: Film Production & Interviews
hobbyPosts.excerpt: Documentation of my hands-on experience in film production, interviewing, and content creation during my internship at Temporary Truth Creative.
hobbyPosts.description: Real-world experience in professional video production and interviewing during my internship. This collection showcases the practical skills I developed in client meetings, interview preparation, and film production workflows.
achievements: Conducted professional interviews with industry figures
